record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO REPORT
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO REPORT -- (Senate - October 04, 2007)

[Page: S12825]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate committees may file reports on legislative and executive calendar business on Tuesday, October 9, from 12 noon to 3 p.m., notwithstanding a recess or adjournment of the Senate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
